Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

State.description: The state of the Resource to transition to. When policy control is disabled globally, no policy can enter 'Operating', 'Triggered', or 'Enabled' state.
State.longDescription: This parameter shall contain the state of the Resource to transition to. When policy control is disabled globally, no policy can enter 'Operating', 'Triggered', or 'Enabled' state.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NodeManager.description: The Node Manager schema describes metrics and control properties for Node Manager application.
NodeManager.longDescription: The Node Manager schema contains resources describing objects used by Node Manager to monitor and control node's power and performance.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Domains.description: The Domain schema contains properties related to monitoring and control of the given power capping domain.
Domains.longDescription: The Domain schema contains properties related to monitoring and control of the given power capping domain.

MaxNumberOfPolicies.description: Maximal number of policies supported by this manager.
MaxNumberOfPolicies.longDescription: This property shall contain a maximal number of policies of all types which can be created and maintained by this manager.

NmVersion.description: Application version running on this manager.
NmVersion.longDescription: This property shall contain the firmware version as defined by the manufacturer for the associated manager.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Policies.longDescription: This type shall contain policies created for this domain.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

ThrottlingStatus.description: The link to the throttling status reported by this manager.
ThrottlingStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a Resource type ThrottlingStatus.

Triggers.longDescription: This type shall contain available triggers for policies in a domain.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
